txt.en: The vile Kargríp has taken Lírband, the Court of Song. If the White Company is to gain control over the city, this minion of Lhaereth the Stained must be removed quickly.
Kargríp can be found at Lírband upon the Circle of Madness.\n\nYou should defeat Kargríp.
The vile Kargríp has taken Lírband and must be removed.
Kargríp can be found at Lírband upon the Circle of Madness.\n\nYou should defeat Kargríp.
You have defeated the vile Kargríp and provided a great service to the White Company. Their efforts to reclaim Minas Ithil are now ever closer thanks to you.
